title: Game client freezing please help
body: Everytime i go into champ sleect, once in a while it freezes then counts it as -lp and i have to wait for a client that doesnt work even when i  repair or try to fix it keeps on happening it also sometimes dcs me when im loading a game for no reason AT all. Its really pissing me off can i have some help?

replies.body: Freezing at champion select can happen for a few reasons, but there are two super common ones.  The first is the use of third party programs that don't interact well with league, so remove any you might have like play.tv.  You might also have a network issue that's failing to stay connected and kicking you off, so I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to be sure.  Let me know if you have any questions!
